mapper.select: select sp.id as productId, sp.cn_name, sp.fr_name, sp.en_name, sp.product_model_id, spc.picture, sp.min_battery_num, sp.after_sales_flag, sp.added_services_flag, sp.mater_parameter, sp.other_parameter, sp.speed, sp.power, sp.mileage, sp.charge_cycle, sc.id as colourId, sc.colour_name, sc.colour_RGB, sc.colour_16, sc.colour_code from site_product sp left join site_product_colour spc on sp.product_model_id = spc.product_id left join site_colour sc on spc.colour_id = sc.id and sc.dr = 0 where sp.dr = 0 and sp.product_model_id = #{id}

select DISTINCT sp.id as partsId, sp.parts_type, sp.parts_number, sp.cn_name, sp.fr_name, sp.en_name, sp.picture, sp.price, sp.sources, sp.currency_unit, sp.amount_discount, sp.remark from site_parts sp left join site_product_parts spp on sp.id = spp.parts_id and spp.dr = 0 where sp.dr = 0 and sp.`status` = 1
and spp.product_id = #{id}

select spp.id as productPartsId, spp.parts_id, spp.product_id, spp.parameter, spp.qty, sp.en_name, sp.price * spp.qty as price from site_product_parts spp left join site_parts sp on spp.parts_id = sp.id and sp.dr = 0 where spp.dr = 0 and parts_type = 3
and spp.product_id = #{id}

select spm.id as modelid, spm.product_model_name as productModelName, spp.battery, spp.id as productPriceId, IFNULL(spp.price_type, 0) as priceType, (select price from site_product_price where dr = 0 and product_model_id = spm.id and price_type = 2 limit 1) as price, (select should_pay_period from site_product_price where dr = 0 and product_model_id = spm.id and price_type = 3 limit 1) as shouldPayPeriod, IFNULL(spp.start_price, 0) as startPrice from site_product_model spm left join site_product_price spp on spm.id = spp.product_model_id and spp.dr = 0 and spp.price_type in (2, 3) left join site_product sp on sp.product_model_id = spm.id and sp.dr = 0 where spm.dr = 0 and sp.status = 1 group by modelid, productPriceId order by battery, price

select CONCAT(model.product_model_name, '-' , price.battery) as scooterBattery, price.tax, price.prepaid_deposit, price.installment_time, price.should_pay_period from site_product_price price inner join site_product_model model on price.product_model_id = model.id and model.dr = 0 where price.dr = 0 and price.`status` = 1 and price.price_type = 1 order by scooterBattery, installment_time
